page.title: 13EDUCATION IN MIDHURST
page.content: Education in this area consists of nursery schooling,3 primary schools for pupils from 5-1O years, an intermediate school for 1O-13 year olds and a secondary comprehensive school from 13-18 years.Private education is also available if parents wish to pay fees for schooling.The schools are situated in rural surroundings and the pupils benefit greatly from such an environment. Adults may continue study and a wide range of subjects is offered at evening classes which are held at the Secondary School and the Grange Centre.The courses are very popular especially in the winter.The W.E.A. run courses which are very successful. Confidential help is available free to adults with a literacy problem.
